answerText: SHO [or SHM; or simple harmonic oscillators; or simple harmonic motion][10] Pendulums can be approximated as simple harmonic oscillators if one makes this approximation, which is essentially a truncation of the Taylor series of the sine function to one term.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Dartmouth A Round 13 | 1 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These systems are governed by Hooke's Law. For 10 points each: [10] Name these systems in which the restoring force is proportional to the displacement from the equilibrium position.
